name: Classic Pancakes
ingredients: Flour, milk, eggs, sugar, baking powder
instructions: Mix dry ingredients, add wet ingredients, cook on a griddle.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
ingredients: Greek yogurt, granola, mixed berries, honey
instructions: Layer yogurt, granola, berries, and honey in a glass.

name: Egg and Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread, cook eggs, assemble with avocado slices.

name: Chicken Wrap
ingredients: Grilled chicken, tortilla, lettuce, tomato, ranch dressing
instructions: Fill tortilla with ingredients, wrap, and enjoy.

name: Quinoa Salad
ingredients: Quinoa, cucumber, bell peppers, red onion, feta cheese
instructions: Cook quinoa, mix with chopped vegetables and feta.

name: Vegetable Sushi Rolls
ingredients: Sushi rice, nori sheets, cucumber, avocado, carrot
instructions: Spread rice on nori, add veggies, roll, and slice.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: Ground beef, spaghetti, tomato sauce, onion, garlic
instructions: Cook beef, add sauce, serve over cooked pasta.

name: Grilled Veggie Skewers
ingredients: Bell peppers, zucchini, mushrooms, onion, marinade
instructions: Thread veggies onto skewers, grill until charred.

name: Teriyaki Salmon
ingredients: Salmon fillet, teriyaki sauce, broccoli, rice
instructions: Marinate salmon, bake, serve with steamed broccoli and rice.

name: Homemade Trail Mix
ingredients: Almonds, cashews, dried cranberries, dark chocolate
instructions: Mix ingredients in a bowl, portion into snack bags.

name: Hummus and Veggies
ingredients: Hummus, baby carrots, cucumber, bell pepper
instructions: Slice veggies, dip in hummus, enjoy.

name: Popcorn with Herbs
instructions: Pop kernels, melt butter, toss with herbs.
